title: The plastic components used within the area shall be recycled; failing which the resort shall be closed down within 48 hours
clause_text: The plastic components used within the area shall be recycled; failing which the resort shall be closed down within 48 hours. Natural streams / slopes / terrain shall be kept as it is, except for the built-up area.
section: The norms for buildings shall be as follows -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
